mng: to rest, to stop doing sth for a period of time, to cease, (imperative) don't

exm.mng: leisure, relaxation, not working, idle, to enjoy leisure, to lie fallow
to recuperate, to recover, to convalesce
to suspend schooling, to defer study
variant of 休閒|休闲 leisure, relaxation, not working, idle
to chatter or jabber on and on
to retire, to leave work and rest (euphemism for compulsory retirement of old cadres)
